etymology.interpretation: Names the blossom of the lotus plant, common in ponds and lakes. Often carries poetic connotations of purity and elegance.

parts.english: lotus; to carry on the shoulder; to shoulder; burden

examples.chinese: 夏天的池塘里开满了荷花(夏天的池塘裡開滿了荷花)。
examples.pinyin: Xiàtiān de chítáng lǐ kāi mǎn le héhuā.
examples.english: In summer, the pond is full of blooming lotuses.

examples.chinese: 她画了一幅荷花图(她畫了一幅荷花圖)。
examples.pinyin: Tā huà le yī fú héhuā tú.
examples.english: She painted a picture of lotus flowers.

examples.chinese: 荷花象征纯洁与高雅(荷花象徵純潔與高雅)。
examples.english: Lotus flowers symbolize purity and elegance.
